BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.delay#
BlackBox.type:
delay#
  :: (HasCallStack, Undefined a) -- (ARG[0],ARG[1])
  => Clock domain gated       -- ARG[2]
  -> Signal clk a             -- ARG[3]
  -> Signal clk a

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.register#
BlackBox.type:
register#
  :: (HasCallStack,Undefined a) -- (ARG[0],ARG[1])
  => Clock domain gated       -- ARG[2]
  -> Reset domain synchronous -- ARG[3]
  -> a                        -- ARG[4]
  -> Signal clk a             -- ARG[5]
  -> Signal clk a
BlackBox.template:
-- register begin~IF ~ISGATED[2] ~THEN
~GENSYM[~COMPNAME_register][0] : block
  signal ~GENSYM[clk][1] : std_logic;
  signal ~GENSYM[ce][2] : boolean;
begin
  (~SYM[1],~SYM[2]) <= ~ARG[2];~IF ~ISSYNC[3] ~THEN
  ~GENSYM[~COMPNAME_reg][3] : process(~SYM[1])
  begin
    if rising_edge(~SYM[1]) then
      if ~ARG[3] = '1' then
        ~RESULT <= ~LITC[4]
        -- pragma translate_off
        after 1 ps
        -- pragma translate_on
        ;
      elsif ~SYM[2] then
        ~RESULT <= ~ARG[5]
        -- pragma translate_off
        after 1 ps
        -- pragma translate_on
        ;
      end if;
    end if;
  end process;~ELSE
  ~SYM[3] : process(~SYM[1],~ARG[3])
  begin
    if ~ARG[3] = '1' then
      ~RESULT <= ~LITC[4];
    elsif rising_edge(~SYM[1]) then
      if ~SYM[2] then
        ~RESULT <= ~ARG[5]
        -- pragma translate_off
        after 1 ps
        -- pragma translate_on
        ;
      end if;
    end if;
  end process;~FI
end block;~ELSE ~IF ~ISSYNC[3] ~THEN
~SYM[0] : process(~ARG[2])
begin
  if rising_edge(~ARG[2]) then
    if ~ARG[3] = '1' then
      ~RESULT <= ~LITC[4]
      -- pragma translate_off
      after 1 ps
      -- pragma translate_on
      ;
    else
      ~RESULT <= ~ARG[5]
      -- pragma translate_off
      after 1 ps
      -- pragma translate_on
      ;
    end if;
  end if;
end process;~ELSE
~SYM[0] : process(~ARG[2],~ARG[3])
begin
  if ~ARG[3] = '1' then
    ~RESULT <= ~LITC[4]
    -- pragma translate_off
    after 1 ps
    -- pragma translate_on
    ;
  elsif rising_edge(~ARG[2]) then
    ~RESULT <= ~ARG[5]
    -- pragma translate_off
    after 1 ps
    -- pragma translate_on
    ;
  end if;
end process;~FI~FI
-- register end

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.clockGate
BlackBox.type:
clockGate
  :: Clock domain gated -- ARG[0]
  -> Signal domain Bool -- ARG[1]
  -> Clock domain 'Gated

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.clockGen
BlackBox.type:
clockGen
  :: (domain ~ Dom nm period -- ARG[0]
     ,KnownSymbol nm         -- ARG[1]
     ,KnownNat period)       -- ARG[2]
  => Clock domain Source

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.tbClockGen
BlackBox.type:
tbClockGen
  :: (domain ~ Dom nm period -- ARG[0]
     ,KnownSymbol nm         -- ARG[1]
     ,KnownNat period)       -- ARG[2]
  => Signal domain Bool      -- ARG[3]
  -> Clock domain Source

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.asyncResetGen
BlackBox.template:
-- pragma translate_off
~RESULT <= '1',
           '0' after 3001 ps;
-- pragma translate_on

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.syncResetGen
BlackBox.type:
syncResetGen :: ( domain ~ 'Dom n clkPeriod
                 , KnownNat clkPeriod )
              => Reset domain 'Synchronous
BlackBox.template:
-- pragma translate_off
~RESULT <= '1',
           '0' after (2999 ps + ~LIT[1]0 ps);
-- pragma translate_on

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.unsafeFromAsyncReset
BlackBox.type: unsafeFromAsyncReset :: Reset domain Asynchronous -> Signal domain Bool

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.unsafeToAsyncReset
BlackBox.type: unsafeToAsyncReset :: Signal domain Bool -> Reset domain Asynchronous

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.fromSyncReset
BlackBox.type: fromSyncReset :: Reset domain Synchronous -> Signal domain Bool

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.unsafeToSyncReset
BlackBox.type: unsafeToSyncReset :: Signal domain Bool -> Reset domain Synchronous
